summary: Successfully configured the React application to serve only index.html without exposing test HTML files. Removed timezone-fix-working.html from public directory, created .dockerignore to exclude test HTML files from Docker build context, updated Dockerfile to only copy essential build files, and verified the React app remains single-page without routing. The application now serves only the main dashboard without multiple pages or test files.
current_status: All tasks completed - single-page React dashboard configured with only index.html accessible, test HTML files excluded from production build while remaining available for development.
